title: Pool, Gated entrance, Perimeter fence, Hot Tub, Picnic area, Outdoor
posting_body: Exterior Amenities: Pool, Gated entrance, Perimeter fence, Hot Tub, Picnic area, Outdoor Grills, Laundry room, School bus stop, Carports, Handicap modified units

Interior Amenities: W/D connections, Walk-in closets, Walk-in showers, Private patios/balconies, Cable ready, Hi-speed internet, High ceilings, Storage closet outside, Non-carpeted flooring, Dishwashers, Garbage disposals, Fire places, Ceiling fans, Miniblinds, Microwaves, Frost free refrigerators
ask for Bryan- Free apartment locator, all areas, all situations, all credit.
